name: Blue Studios.io Inc.
description: Developer of a Web3 family crypto wallet designed to create opportunities for families to come together to plan, invest, learn, and play. The company's platform provides families with tools and software to reimagine what families can do together with money and assets, enabling families to get empowered to be the custodians of their data and wealth.
one_liner: Developer of a Web3 family crypto wallet designed to create opportunities for families to come together to plan, invest, learn, and play. The company's platform provides families with tools and software to reimagine what families can do together with money and assets, enabling families to get empowered to be the custodians of their data and wealth.
